title: DevCon Summit 2016 Branding
paragraph: On my second year with DevCon, I created Branding and Style guides for the Marketing team. I also worked on the UI for DevCon Summit 2016 website.
note: Link will only be available this month, since we'll upload soon the new 2017 website

cards.title: The Logo
cards.paragraph: The logo was inspired by Penrose Triangle and Infinite Loop of Fast forward icon.

cards.title: Branding
cards.paragraph: The objective of this years branding is to showcase modern yet next level graphics, I came up with 3D-channels concepts plus 3D objects.

cards.title: 360 Degree Creatives
cards.paragraph: 2016, year when VR/AR emerges to our lives. I created 360degrees creative assets used for social media marketing.
cards.footnote: I used Blender and Photoshop to create these graphics

cards.title: The Website
cards.paragraph: We treat the UI for 2016 website to be an interactive version of our marketing assets, as it follows the brand guidelines I made.
